name: (un)usual Error
description:
A new game has come out, the producer declares the highest quality and stunning low-poly graphics, the developer has been working on it all night so there should be no bugs in it. will it be so, play to find out.

Controls:

wsad/arrows -movement

Q - grab the rock near the mouse cursor

E - throw the rock towards the mouse cursor

R- teleport to the mouse cursor

Unfortunately, after death, you have to restart the game
